channel.title: 2. Usage on Code Coverage Dashboard
channel.description: Recent content in 2. Usage on Code Coverage Dashboard

item.title: Github Actions
item.description: To use the Code Coverage Dashboard, you need to host the Code Coverage Dashboard server in your environment first and then add the following 2 actions to the repository. â€» Please refer here about how to host the Code Coverage Dashboard server. on push / on pull request : Publish code coverage report The Action triggered by on push / on pull request will post a report to the Code Coverage Dashboard that hosted on your environment.
